metadata.title: CVE-2023-38575 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Non-transparent sharing of return predictor targets between contexts insome Intel(R) Processors may allow an authorized user to potentially enableinformation disclosure via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
